channel.title: Type these sentences
channel.description:
Alright, a completely random paragraph, but type the sentences WITHOUT using copy or backspace, and without quoting nub.
This is a short rogues' gallery of bad practice. It is short because we don't want to dwell on negative examples, but it exists to offer a few warnings and to explain how problems are often caused. Most of the items have been mentioned elsewhere in advice on what to avoid, or cautions of one kind or another. I think they are worth second mention in a different context.

item.title: Type these sentences
item.dc:creator: @Aftermath_961 Aftermath
item.description:
@Aftermath_961 wrote:

This is a short rogue’s gallery of bad practice. It is short because we don’t want to dwell on negative examples, but it exists to fill up some space and make reading take longer. Most of the items have been mentioned such as the forum being invaded by /b/tards and advice on what to avoid, or cautions of one kind of or another are non-existent. I think we should go hunting.

Read full topic

item.title: Type these sentences
item.dc:creator: @1337h4x 1337h4x
item.description:
@1337h4x wrote:

fine

Movements come and movements go
Leaders speak, movements cease, when their heads are flown

but all these punks got bullets in their heads,
departments of police, the judges, the feds!

Systems of networks, keeping people calm

you know they went after king
when he spoke out on vietnam

he turned power to the have nots
and then came the shots

chop top he says im gonna win big

choose not a life of imitation
distant cousin to the reservation

defunk the pistol that you pay for
this punk, the feeling that you stay for

in time i want to be your best friend
east side love is living on the west end[/quote]

fo’ shizzle!
